projectDescription: Comprehensive hackathon management platform with user management, hackathon creation, team formation, project submission, judging system, and community features.

sprints.name: Sprint 1: User Management & Authentication
sprints.goal: Complete user management system including authentication, authorization, role management, and user profiles.

sprints.name: Sprint 2: Hackathon Creation & Management
sprints.goal: Implement hackathon builder and visual customization tools for organizers.

sprints.name: Sprint 3: Registration & Team Management
sprints.goal: Build registration system and team formation features.

sprints.name: Sprint 4: Project Submission & Showcase
sprints.goal: Create project submission portal and gallery system.

sprints.name: Sprint 5: Judging System
sprints.goal: Implement judge management, scoring, and results system.

sprints.name: Sprint 6: Communication & Community
sprints.goal: Build discussion forums, networking features, and communication tools.

tickets.title: Create Authentication Pages Layout
tickets.description: Set up login, register, forgot-password, reset-password, and verify-email page components with responsive design and routing in Next.js.

tickets.title: Build Registration Form Component
tickets.description: Implement registration form with email, username, password fields, real-time validation using React Hook Form + Zod, and password strength indicator.

tickets.title: Build Login Form Component
tickets.description: Create login form with email/password fields, remember me checkbox, forgot password link, and error handling for invalid credentials.

tickets.title: Implement Social OAuth Login UI
tickets.description: Add OAuth login buttons for GitHub, Google, LinkedIn with popup/redirect flow handling and loading states.

tickets.title: Create Password Reset Flow UI
tickets.description: Build forgot password form, email confirmation screen, reset password form with token validation, and success/error handling.

tickets.title: Build Email Verification Flow
tickets.description: Create email verification pending page, success/failure pages, resend functionality with countdown timer, and expired link handling.

tickets.title: Implement Wallet Connection UI
tickets.description: Add Connect Wallet button, wallet selection modal (MetaMask, WalletConnect), connection status indicator, and signature request handling.

tickets.title: Create Authentication State Management
tickets.description: Set up global auth context/store with useAuth hook, token storage, automatic refresh, auth guards for protected routes, and role-based rendering.

tickets.title: Build User Profile Creation Flow
tickets.description: Create multi-step profile wizard with avatar upload, skills selector, bio editor, social links, and profile completion progress indicator.

tickets.title: Implement Session Management UI
tickets.description: Build active sessions display, device/location info, session termination controls, and suspicious activity alerts.

tickets.title: Create Account Settings Page
tickets.description: Design account settings with email change, password update, 2FA setup (prep), connected accounts management, and account deletion option.

tickets.title: Build Role Switching Interface
tickets.description: Implement role selector for multi-role users, role-specific dashboard switching, and permission-based UI element visibility.

tickets.title: Create Role Selection Component
tickets.description: Build role selection interface for registration with options for Participant, Organizer, Judge, Sponsor, and ability to request multiple roles.

tickets.title: Build Role-Based Dashboard Router
tickets.description: Implement dynamic dashboard routing that displays different dashboard layouts based on user's active role (participant/organizer/judge/sponsor/admin).

tickets.title: Create Role Switching UI
tickets.description: Design role switcher dropdown in navbar for users with multiple roles, showing current active role and available roles to switch.

tickets.title: Implement Role Request Modal
tickets.description: Build modal for requesting additional roles with reason field, supporting documents upload, and submission confirmation.

tickets.title: Create Role-Based Navigation Menu
tickets.description: Implement dynamic navigation menu that shows/hides menu items based on user's current active role and permissions.

tickets.title: Build Permission-Based Component Wrapper
tickets.description: Create HOC/component wrapper that conditionally renders UI elements based on user permissions (e.g., <RequireRole role="organizer">).

tickets.title: Design Role Management Admin Panel
tickets.description: Build admin interface to view all users, their roles, pending role requests, with approve/reject actions and bulk operations.

tickets.title: Create Role Request Status Page
tickets.description: Implement page showing user's role request history, current status (pending/approved/rejected), and admin feedback.

tickets.title: Build Role Badge Components
tickets.description: Design visual role badges/indicators to display on user profiles, comments, and team member lists with role-specific colors/icons.

tickets.title: Implement Organizer Dashboard
tickets.description: Create organizer-specific dashboard with hackathon creation button, managed hackathons list, and quick stats overview.

tickets.title: Build Judge Dashboard
tickets.description: Design judge-specific dashboard showing assigned hackathons, pending reviews count, and scoring deadlines.

tickets.title: Create Sponsor Dashboard
tickets.description: Implement sponsor dashboard with sponsored hackathons, prize management, and participant engagement metrics.

tickets.title: Build Admin Dashboard
tickets.description: Create admin dashboard with platform statistics, user management shortcuts, content moderation queue, and system health indicators.

tickets.title: Implement Role-Based Feature Gates
tickets.description: Add UI gates that disable/enable features based on role (e.g., "Create Hackathon" button only for organizers).

tickets.title: Set Up Authentication Database Schema
tickets.description: Create users, user_profiles, sessions, oauth_accounts, password_resets, email_verifications, and wallet_addresses tables with proper indexes and constraints.

tickets.title: Implement User Registration Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/auth/register with email/username validation, password hashing with bcrypt, duplicate checking, and email verification token generation.

tickets.title: Create Login Endpoint with JWT
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/auth/login with credential validation, JWT access token (15min) and refresh token (7days) generation, and failed attempt tracking.

tickets.title: Implement OAuth Provider Integration
tickets.description: Set up OAuth flow for GitHub, Google, LinkedIn with provider configuration, callback handling, account creation/linking, and token storage.

tickets.title: Build Password Reset Endpoints
tickets.description: Create POST /api/auth/forgot-password and /api/auth/reset-password with secure token generation, expiry validation, and email notifications.

tickets.title: Create Email Verification System
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/auth/verify-email and /api/auth/resend-verification with token management, rate limiting, and status updates.

tickets.title: Implement Wallet Authentication
tickets.description: Build POST /api/auth/wallet/nonce and /api/auth/wallet/verify for Web3 signature validation, account linking, and multi-chain support.

tickets.title: Build Token Management System
tickets.description: Create POST /api/auth/refresh for token refresh, blacklisting for logout, validation middleware, and token versioning for forced logout.

tickets.title: Create Session Management API
tickets.description: Implement GET /api/auth/sessions and DELETE /api/auth/sessions/:id with metadata tracking, concurrent limits, and timeout handling.

tickets.title: Implement Rate Limiting & Security
tickets.description: Add rate limiting per endpoint/IP, CAPTCHA integration, request validation, CORS configuration, helmet.js headers, and brute force protection.

tickets.title: Build Email Service Integration
tickets.description: Configure SendGrid/AWS SES with email templates (verification, reset, welcome), queue with retry logic, and delivery tracking.

tickets.title: Create User Profile Endpoints
tickets.description: Build GET/PUT /api/users/profile with avatar upload to S3, skills management, social links validation, and profile completion tracking.

tickets.title: Implement Role Management System
tickets.description: Create role assignment endpoints, permission checking middleware, role-based access control (RBAC), and role switching functionality.

tickets.title: Build Audit Logging System
tickets.description: Implement authentication event logging (login, logout, password changes), security event tracking, and suspicious activity detection.

tickets.title: Create Role Database Schema
tickets.description: Design roles, user_roles, permissions, role_permissions tables with many-to-many relationships and timestamp tracking.

tickets.title: Implement Role Assignment Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/roles/assign to assign roles to users with authorization checks, validation, and audit logging.

tickets.title: Create Role Request System
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/roles/request and GET /api/roles/requests with request creation, status tracking, and notification triggers.

tickets.title: Build Role Approval Workflow
tickets.description: Create PUT /api/roles/requests/:id/approve and /reject endpoints with admin authorization, email notifications, and status updates.

tickets.title: Implement Role Switching Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/roles/switch to change active role for multi-role users with session updates and permission refresh.

tickets.title: Create Permission Checking Middleware
tickets.description: Implement Express middleware to check user permissions for each route with role/permission validation and error responses.

tickets.title: Build Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
tickets.description: Design RBAC system with granular permissions, role hierarchies, permission inheritance, and resource-level access control.

tickets.title: Implement Role Listing Endpoint
tickets.description: Create GET /api/roles to fetch all available roles and GET /api/users/:id/roles for user-specific roles with permissions included.

tickets.title: Create Bulk Role Management
tickets.description: Build POST /api/roles/bulk-assign for admin bulk operations with validation, transaction handling, and audit logging.

tickets.title: Implement Role Revocation System
tickets.description: Create DELETE /api/users/:id/roles/:roleId to revoke roles with cascading updates, notification system, and grace period handling.

tickets.title: Build Role Analytics Endpoints
tickets.description: Implement GET /api/analytics/roles with role distribution stats, role request metrics, and permission usage tracking.

tickets.title: Create Default Role Configuration
tickets.description: Set up system to assign default "Participant" role on registration with configurable defaults and automatic permission grants.

tickets.title: Implement Role-Based Rate Limiting
tickets.description: Configure different rate limits per role (e.g., organizers get higher limits) with Redis-based tracking and custom headers.

tickets.title: Build Role Verification System
tickets.description: Create role verification for special roles (e.g., verified organizer) with document upload, manual review, and badge assignment.

tickets.title: Set Up Database Infrastructure
tickets.description: Configure PostgreSQL database, create development/staging/production databases, set up automated backups, and implement connection pooling.

tickets.title: Configure Redis for Sessions
tickets.description: Install Redis for session storage and token blacklisting, set up persistence, configure memory limits, and implement clustering for production.

tickets.title: Set Up Email Service
tickets.description: Configure SendGrid/AWS SES accounts, set up domain verification, configure SPF/DKIM records, and implement email bounce handling.

tickets.title: Implement Secrets Management
tickets.description: Set up environment variables for JWT secrets, OAuth client credentials, database URLs, and API keys using AWS Secrets Manager or similar.

tickets.title: Configure File Storage
tickets.description: Set up AWS S3 bucket for avatar storage, configure CDN for image delivery, implement upload size limits, and add virus scanning.

tickets.title: Set Up Role Management Database Tables
tickets.description: Create database migrations for role-related tables, indexes for performance optimization, and seed data for initial roles.

tickets.title: Configure Role-Based Caching
tickets.description: Implement Redis caching for user roles and permissions with cache invalidation on role changes and TTL configuration.

tickets.title: Set Up Role-Based Monitoring
tickets.description: Configure monitoring for role assignment/revocation events, permission denial tracking, and suspicious role switching patterns.

tickets.title: Implement Role Backup System
tickets.description: Create automated backups of role assignments, scheduled exports of role configurations, and role restoration procedures.

tickets.title: Write Unit Tests for Auth Components
tickets.description: Create unit tests for all React components using Jest and React Testing Library with 80% coverage minimum.

tickets.title: Write API Integration Tests
tickets.description: Implement integration tests for all authentication endpoints using Supertest, covering happy paths and error scenarios.

tickets.title: Create E2E Tests for Auth Flows
tickets.description: Build end-to-end tests using Cypress/Playwright for registration, login, password reset, and email verification flows.

tickets.title: Perform Security Testing
tickets.description: Conduct penetration testing on auth endpoints, test for SQL injection, XSS, CSRF vulnerabilities, and validate JWT implementation.

tickets.title: Load Testing for Authentication
tickets.description: Execute load tests using K6/JMeter to validate system performance with 1000+ concurrent authentication requests.

tickets.title: Test Role Assignment Flow
tickets.description: Write tests for role assignment including authorization checks, invalid role handling, and notification triggers.

tickets.title: Test Permission Middleware
tickets.description: Create unit tests for permission checking middleware covering all roles, permission combinations, and edge cases.

tickets.title: Test Role Switching
tickets.description: Implement tests for multi-role switching including session updates, permission changes, and UI element visibility.

tickets.title: Test RBAC Implementation
tickets.description: Validate role-based access control with unauthorized access attempts, permission inheritance, and resource-level permissions.

tickets.title: E2E Role Management Tests
tickets.description: Create end-to-end tests for complete role lifecycle from request to approval to revocation using Cypress/Playwright.

tickets.title: Load Test Role Checking
tickets.description: Performance test permission checking system with 10,000+ concurrent permission checks and role switches.

tickets.title: Test Role-Based UI Rendering
tickets.description: Validate UI components render correctly for each role with permission-based visibility and feature availability.

tickets.title: DOC-1.1.1: Create API Documentation
tickets.description: Document all authentication endpoints using Swagger/OpenAPI with request/response examples and error codes.

tickets.title: DOC-1.1.2: Write Frontend Integration Guide
tickets.description: Create developer guide for implementing auth in frontend components with code examples and best practices.

tickets.title: DOC-1.1.3: Document Security Measures
tickets.description: Write security documentation covering authentication flow, token management, and security best practices implemented.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.1: Create Role Matrix Documentation
tickets.description: Document all roles, their permissions, access levels, and responsibilities in a clear matrix format.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.2: Write Role Management API Docs
tickets.description: Document all role-related endpoints with request/response examples, authorization requirements, and error codes.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.3: Create Role Request Guide
tickets.description: Write user guide for requesting additional roles including requirements, approval process, and timeline expectations.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.4: Document RBAC Implementation
tickets.description: Create technical documentation of RBAC system architecture, permission hierarchy, and integration guidelines.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.5: Build Admin Role Management Guide
tickets.description: Write admin guide for managing user roles, handling requests, bulk operations, and troubleshooting common issues.

tickets.title: Create Hackathon Creation Wizard Layout
tickets.description: Build multi-step wizard interface with progress indicator, step navigation, save draft functionality, and validation between steps.

tickets.title: Build Basic Information Form
tickets.description: Implement form with hackathon title, tagline, description (rich text editor), hackathon type (online/in-person/hybrid), and cover image upload.

tickets.title: Create Date & Timeline Configuration
tickets.description: Design date pickers for registration open/close, hacking start/end, submission deadline, judging period, and results announcement with timezone selector.

tickets.title: Build Location Management Interface
tickets.description: Create location input for in-person events with venue name, address autocomplete, map integration, and virtual event platform URL for online events.

tickets.title: Implement Prize Configuration UI
tickets.description: Build prize tier management with add/remove prizes, prize amount/description, prize categories, sponsor attribution, and special prizes section.

tickets.title: Create Tracks & Categories Manager
tickets.description: Design interface to add multiple tracks/themes, track descriptions, track-specific prizes, color coding, and participant limits per track.

tickets.title: Build Sponsor Section Manager
tickets.description: Implement sponsor tiers (platinum/gold/silver), logo upload with size validation, sponsor description, website links, and display order configuration.

tickets.title: Create Eligibility Requirements Form
tickets.description: Build form for age restrictions, geographic limitations, skill level requirements, team size constraints, and custom eligibility rules.

tickets.title: Implement Schedule Builder
tickets.description: Design drag-and-drop schedule creator with event sessions, workshops, keynotes, break times, and calendar view/list view toggle.

tickets.title: Build Resources & Links Manager
tickets.description: Create interface to add resource categories, documentation links, API documentation, design assets, and tutorial videos.

tickets.title: Create Rules & Guidelines Editor
tickets.description: Implement rich text editor for hackathon rules, code of conduct, submission guidelines, judging criteria, and terms & conditions.

tickets.title: Build FAQ Section Manager
tickets.description: Design FAQ builder with question/answer pairs, category grouping, search functionality, and reorder capability.

tickets.title: Implement Mentor Management Interface
tickets.description: Create mentor profiles section with mentor invitation form, expertise tags, availability schedule, and contact information.

tickets.title: Build Judge Configuration Panel
tickets.description: Design judge invitation interface, scoring criteria builder, weight assignment for criteria, and judge assignment to tracks.

tickets.title: Create Registration Form Builder
tickets.description: Implement custom form field creator with standard fields, custom questions (text/dropdown/checkbox), required/optional flags, and conditional logic.

tickets.title: Build Email Template Manager
tickets.description: Design email template editor for registration confirmation, important updates, submission reminders, and results announcement.

tickets.title: Implement Hackathon Preview Mode
tickets.description: Create preview functionality showing participant view, mobile responsive preview, and publish/unpublish controls.

tickets.title: Build Hackathon Analytics Dashboard
tickets.description: Design real-time statistics display with registration count, submission tracking, demographic breakdown, and engagement metrics.

tickets.title: Create Hackathon Database Schema
tickets.description: Design hackathons, hackathon_tracks, hackathon_prizes, hackathon_sponsors, hackathon_schedule tables with relationships and constraints.

tickets.title: Implement Hackathon Creation Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/hackathons with organizer authorization, data validation, slug generation, and initial status setup.

tickets.title: Create Hackathon Update Endpoints
tickets.description: Implement PUT /api/hackathons/:id for updates with field-level updates, version tracking, and change history logging.

tickets.title: Build Draft Management System
tickets.description: Create POST /api/hackathons/draft and auto-save functionality with draft versioning and draft to published conversion.

tickets.title: Implement Timeline Validation
tickets.description: Build validation logic for date consistency, timezone handling, phase transitions, and deadline enforcement.

tickets.title: Create Prize Management Endpoints
tickets.description: Implement CRUD operations for prizes with POST/PUT/DELETE /api/hackathons/:id/prizes, prize tier validation, and sponsor linkage.

tickets.title: Build Track Management System
tickets.description: Create endpoints for track operations with capacity management, track-specific configuration, and participant distribution.

tickets.title: Implement Sponsor Management
tickets.description: Build POST /api/hackathons/:id/sponsors with logo upload to S3, tier management, and display order configuration.

tickets.title: Create Schedule Management API
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/hackathons/:id/schedule with event CRUD operations, conflict detection, and calendar export (ICS).

tickets.title: Build Registration Configuration
tickets.description: Create custom form field storage, validation rules engine, conditional logic processor, and data encryption for sensitive fields.

tickets.title: Implement Eligibility Checking System
tickets.description: Build eligibility rule engine, automated verification where possible, manual review queue, and rejection reason tracking.

tickets.title: Create FAQ Management Endpoints
tickets.description: Implement CRUD for FAQs with search indexing, category management, and view count tracking.

tickets.title: Build Mentor Management System
tickets.description: Create POST /api/hackathons/:id/mentors with invitation system, availability tracking, and skill matching algorithm.

tickets.title: Implement Judge Management
tickets.description: Build judge invitation endpoints, assignment to tracks/categories, scoring permission control, and conflict of interest tracking.

tickets.title: Create Email Campaign System
tickets.description: Implement email template storage, variable substitution, scheduled sending, and delivery tracking.

tickets.title: Build Hackathon Publishing System
tickets.description: Create POST /api/hackathons/:id/publish with pre-publish validation, status transitions, and notification triggers.

tickets.title: Implement Hackathon Cloning
tickets.description: Build POST /api/hackathons/:id/clone to duplicate hackathon as template with selective field copying and reference updates.

tickets.title: Set Up Hackathon Storage Infrastructure
tickets.description: Configure S3 buckets for hackathon assets, CDN for image delivery, and backup strategies for hackathon data.

tickets.title: Implement Search Infrastructure
tickets.description: Set up Elasticsearch for hackathon search with full-text indexing, faceted search, and autocomplete functionality.

tickets.title: Configure Scheduled Job System
tickets.description: Implement cron jobs for status transitions, reminder emails, and deadline enforcement using Bull queue or similar.

tickets.title: Set Up Analytics Pipeline
tickets.description: Create data pipeline for hackathon metrics, real-time aggregation, and analytics dashboard data.

tickets.title: Test Hackathon Creation Wizard
tickets.description: Validate multi-step form flow, data persistence between steps, validation rules, and error handling.

tickets.title: Test Date & Timeline Logic
tickets.description: Verify timezone handling, date validation rules, phase transitions, and deadline enforcement.

tickets.title: Test Registration Form Builder
tickets.description: Validate custom field creation, conditional logic, required field enforcement, and data storage.

tickets.title: Test Publishing Workflow
tickets.description: Verify draft to published transition, validation checks, notification triggers, and visibility changes.

tickets.title: E2E Hackathon Creation Test
tickets.description: Complete end-to-end test from creation to publication including all configurations and settings.

tickets.title: Load Test Hackathon Operations
tickets.description: Test system with 100+ concurrent hackathons, 10,000+ registrations per hackathon, and heavy asset uploads.

tickets.title: Create Hackathon Setup Guide
tickets.description: Write comprehensive guide for organizers covering all setup steps, best practices, and common configurations.

tickets.title: Document Hackathon API Endpoints
tickets.description: Create API documentation for all hackathon-related endpoints with examples and schema definitions.

tickets.title: Build Organizer FAQ
tickets.description: Compile frequently asked questions about hackathon creation, management, and troubleshooting.

tickets.title: Create Theme Selection Interface
tickets.description: Build theme picker with pre-designed templates, preview thumbnails, and apply theme functionality.

tickets.title: Implement Logo Upload Component
tickets.description: Design logo uploader with drag-and-drop, file size validation (max 5MB), format validation (PNG/JPG/SVG), and preview display.

tickets.title: Build Banner Image Manager
tickets.description: Create banner upload for hackathon pages with recommended dimensions display, crop/resize tool, and mobile/desktop preview.

tickets.title: Design Color Scheme Picker
tickets.description: Implement color palette selector with primary/secondary colors, accent color picker, text color contrast checker, and preset color schemes.

tickets.title: Create Custom Font Selector
tickets.description: Build font selection dropdown with Google Fonts integration, heading/body font options, and font size adjustments.

tickets.title: Implement Background Pattern Selector
tickets.description: Design background options with pattern library, custom pattern upload, opacity controls, and solid color option.

tickets.title: Build Layout Configuration Tool
tickets.description: Create layout options for hackathon page with sidebar/no sidebar, section ordering, and widget placement.

tickets.title: Design Custom CSS Editor
tickets.description: Implement advanced CSS input with syntax highlighting, CSS validation, preview mode, and reset to default option.

tickets.title: Create Mobile Responsive Preview
tickets.description: Build device preview modes (mobile/tablet/desktop) with real-time updates and orientation switching.

tickets.title: Implement Branding Consistency Checker
tickets.description: Design tool to verify brand colors in assets, contrast accessibility standards, and responsive image sizing.

tickets.title: Create Theme Storage System
tickets.description: Implement theme configuration storage with JSON schema for theme data, version control, and default theme fallback.

tickets.title: Build Asset Upload Endpoints
tickets.description: Create POST /api/hackathons/:id/assets for logo/banner uploads with image optimization, format conversion, and CDN upload.

tickets.title: Implement Theme Validation
tickets.description: Build validation for color contrast ratios, font loading verification, and CSS security scanning.

tickets.title: Create Theme Template System
tickets.description: Implement pre-built theme templates with template storage, customization options, and template versioning.

tickets.title: Build CSS Sanitization
tickets.description: Create CSS input sanitizer to prevent XSS attacks, remove malicious code, and validate CSS syntax.

tickets.title: Implement Asset Optimization
tickets.description: Build automatic image compression, responsive image generation, and WebP conversion for performance.

tickets.title: Test Theme Customization
tickets.description: Verify theme changes apply correctly, preview matches live view, and responsive design works.

tickets.title: Test Asset Upload Limits
tickets.description: Validate file size restrictions, format validation, and error handling for invalid uploads.

tickets.title: Test Cross-Browser Rendering
tickets.description: Verify custom themes render correctly across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers.

tickets.title: Test CSS Security
tickets.description: Validate CSS sanitization prevents XSS, malicious code injection, and system styling override.

tickets.title: Create Branding Guidelines
tickets.description: Write guide for effective hackathon branding including recommended image dimensions and color accessibility standards.

tickets.title: Document Theme Customization
tickets.description: Create documentation for theme system, customization options, and CSS customization guidelines.

tickets.title: Create Hackathon Registration Page
tickets.description: Build dedicated registration page with hackathon details summary, registration CTA button, deadline countdown timer, and spots remaining indicator.

tickets.title: Design Registration Form Interface
tickets.description: Implement dynamic form renderer for custom fields, multi-step form if needed, progress indicator, and field validation display.

tickets.title: Build Individual Registration Flow
tickets.description: Create individual participant registration with personal information fields, skill selection, experience level, and dietary restrictions/accessibility needs.

tickets.title: Implement Team Registration Option
tickets.description: Design team registration mode with team creation during registration, existing team selection, and team code input field.

tickets.title: Create Registration Confirmation Page
tickets.description: Build success page with confirmation message, registration details summary, next steps information, and add to calendar button.

tickets.title: Design Registration Status Dashboard
tickets.description: Implement participant dashboard showing registration status, team information, hackathon countdown, and action items.

tickets.title: Build Waitlist Interface
tickets.description: Create waitlist signup when hackathon is full with position in queue display, notification preferences, and automatic promotion alerts.

tickets.title: Implement Registration Editing
tickets.description: Design interface to edit registration before deadline with change tracking, resubmission flow, and confirmation updates.

tickets.title: Create Check-in Interface
tickets.description: Build QR code display for event check-in with mobile-friendly view, offline capability, and check-in status indicator.

tickets.title: Design Registration Certificate
tickets.description: Implement downloadable participation certificate with custom template, participant name, and verification QR code.

tickets.title: Build Registration Analytics View
tickets.description: Create organizer view of registration metrics with real-time counter, demographic charts, and timeline visualization.

tickets.title: Implement Bulk Registration Upload
tickets.description: Design CSV upload for bulk registration with template download, validation feedback, and error reporting.

tickets.title: Create Registration Search & Filter
tickets.description: Build searchable participant list with filters by status, team, skills, and export functionality.

tickets.title: Design Registration Approval Queue
tickets.description: Implement approval interface for organizers with application review, bulk actions, and rejection reason input. .

tickets.title: Create Registration Database Schema
tickets.description: Design registrations, registration_answers, waitlist, check_ins tables with foreign keys and indexes.

tickets.title: Build Registration Submission Endpoint
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/hackathons/:id/register with custom field validation, duplicate checking, and capacity verification.

tickets.title: Create Registration Validation System
tickets.description: Build eligibility verification, required field checking, custom rule processing, and age verification logic.

tickets.title: Implement Waitlist Management
tickets.description: Create waitlist queue system with automatic promotion, notification triggers, and position tracking.

tickets.title: Build Registration Status Management
tickets.description: Implement status transitions (pending/approved/rejected/withdrawn) with audit logging and notification hooks.

tickets.title: Create Registration Limits Enforcement
tickets.description: Build capacity checking with total limit enforcement, track-specific limits, and team size validation.

tickets.title: Implement Registration Editing API
tickets.description: Create PUT /api/registrations/:id with edit deadline enforcement, change tracking, and re-validation.

tickets.title: Build Check-in System Backend
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/registrations/:id/checkin with QR code generation, timestamp logging, and attendance tracking.

tickets.title: Create Bulk Registration Processing
tickets.description: Build batch registration endpoint with CSV parsing, async processing, and result reporting.

tickets.title: Implement Registration Export
tickets.description: Create data export endpoints with CSV/Excel generation, custom field mapping, and GDPR compliance.

tickets.title: Build Registration Notifications
tickets.description: Implement email notifications for confirmation, waitlist updates, approval status, and reminders.

tickets.title: Create Registration Statistics API
tickets.description: Build analytics endpoints with demographic aggregation, timeline data, and conversion funnel metrics.

tickets.title: Implement Duplicate Detection
tickets.description: Create algorithm to detect duplicate registrations by email/name matching, IP tracking, and manual review flagging.

tickets.title: Build Registration Approval Workflow
tickets.description: Implement approval queue endpoints with batch approval/rejection, custom criteria, and automated approvals.

tickets.title: Test Registration Form Validation
tickets.description: Verify all field validations, custom field rendering, and error message display.

tickets.title: Test Registration Capacity Limits
tickets.description: Validate capacity enforcement, waitlist triggers, and overflow handling.

tickets.title: Test Waitlist Functionality
tickets.description: Verify queue ordering, automatic promotion, and notification delivery.

tickets.title: Test Registration Approval Flow
tickets.description: Validate approval workflow, status updates, and notification triggers.

tickets.title: Load Test Registration System
tickets.description: Test with 5000+ concurrent registrations, form submission performance, and database scalability.

tickets.title: Test Data Export Functionality
tickets.description: Verify export formats, data completeness, and large dataset handling.

tickets.title: Create Registration User Guide
